wikipedia_page.main: Robert John Lanchbury (born 11 February 1950) is a former English first-class cricketer who played for Gloucestershire and Worcestershire in the early 1970s, as well as making a few one-day appearances.

response: * Robert Lanchbury, is a former English cricketer who played first-class cricket for Gloucestershire and Worcestershire in the early 1970s. Born in Evesham in 1950.
